meanings.sent1: She commingles the colors to create a new shade.
meanings.sent2: The chef commingles the ingredients to make a delicious soup.
meanings.sent3: The artist commingles the paints with great care, like a delicate dance.
meanings.sent4: In the garden, the flowers commingle their scents in the evening breeze.
meanings.sent5: The DJ skillfully commingles different music genres to keep the party alive.

meanings.sent1: The rivers commingle at the delta before flowing into the sea.
meanings.sent2: Different cultures commingle in this vibrant city, creating a rich tapestry of traditions.
meanings.sent3: The flavors of the dish commingle in a delightful explosion on the taste buds.
meanings.sent4: The laughter of children commingles with the chirping of birds in the park.
meanings.sent5: The scents of various flowers commingle in the air, creating a fragrant bouquet.
